product_name: Outside Inside Picnic Ping Pong Set
long_description: For compact fun on your next picnic or camping trip, bring the Picnic Ping Pong Set from Outside Inside. It's ideal for 2 players ages 5 and up. Includes retractable net, 2 paddles and 3 ping pong balls. Comes in a polyester-and-mesh carry bag with drawcord. Instructions included.
short_description: For compact fun on your next picnic or camping trip, bring the Picnic Ping Pong Set from Outside Inside. It's ideal for 2 players ages 5 and up.
